author: roberto
msg: ~Updated C# DataMapper NUnit MySql ByteFx, Oracle MS OracleClient, and Oracle ODP.NET files for dbType

author: ekoneil
msg: Fix for JIRA 316.  Turned out that the beehive-wsdltypes.jar needs to be generated every build, so it now lives in wsm/build/jars and is referenced as such throughout the WSM / service control builds.
Also changes the dependence of the petstoreWeb build on having deploy-beehive called; this is now a dependency of the "build" target.

author: rich
msg: - http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/BEEHIVE-735 : netui-blank now out of sync with tutorial_controls.html
- http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/BEEHIVE-736 : page flow source code is visible from the browser in netui-samples
Also, related to the fix for http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/BEEHIVE-615 , I've changed the JUnit tests to go against the template web.xml rather than another one that was checked in there.
And, deleted the (unused and deprecated) Global.app from netui-blank.

author: gbayon
msg: - Updated config and mapping files for MySql to pass test for custom type handler (the dbType is not Varchar but varchar !)

author: roberto
msg: ~Updated C# DataMapper Guide for inheritance mapping changes
